content: That's really helpful. I think I'll also ask the brand about their content calendar and how they plan to incorporate my content into their overall social media strategy. I want to make sure my content is being promoted at times when it will get the most visibility and engagement. And speaking of engagement, do you think I should ask the brand about their strategy for responding to comments and messages on my promoted content? I want to make sure they're not just promoting my content and then ignoring the conversations that come from it.
